tag_list: it-consultant, web-developer, lamp, asp-net, c, php, mysql, jquery, xhtml, css, freelancer
overview:
freelance web developer and designer from Lahore, Pakistan. I’ve been working with PHP, XHTML, jQuery and CSS for several years, and graduated in 2003 with a BSc in Computing and Internet Technologies. I specialise in creating functional web sites using Open Source Technologies LAMP ( Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP ), also love to work with other RIA [ Rich Internet Application ] web development tools such as Flash Builder (Flex), AJAX etc.

Solutions oriented professional IT consultant who excels at managing projects, collaborating with project teams, interfacing with clients, and deploying technology to build successful solutions for clients.

Dedicated, self-motivated achiever who is committed to success and adept at juggling multiple tasks in a high-pressured environment, competent technical guru with six years of hands-on development experience. Strong communication skills and proven record of teamwork and leadership, handled large scale projects as Team Leader and System Analyst.
